conbody.p: The Persona identifies the user type and defines the information that is available to this user. There are three types of “persona”:

dlentry.dd: A user who is an “Admin” type, has view access to the system data of all customers. These users are typically company personnel.

A user who is of an "OEM" type belongs to a special type of customer. This customer is typically an |comp| partner, for example a service provider or reseller. The partner provides |prod| to its own customers. This type of user has view access to the account system data and to the system data of all his/her customers.
A user who is a "Customer" type has view access to the system data of its own account.
